00144 typedef enum
00145 {
00146     CSL_RTC_DAY_PERIODIC_INTERRUPT,   /* day periodic Interrupt enable */
00147     CSL_RTC_HR_PERIODIC_INTERRUPT,    /* hour periodic Interrupt enable */
00148     CSL_RTC_MINS_PERIODIC_INTERRUPT,  /* minute periodic Interrupt enable */
00149     CSL_RTC_SEC_PERIODIC_INTERRUPT,   /* second periodic Interrupt enable */
00150     CSL_RTC_MS_PERIODIC_INTERRUPT  /* milli second periodic Interrupt enable*/
00151 } CSL_RTCPeriodicInterruptType;
00152 
00159 typedef enum
00160 {
00161     CSL_RTC_MSEVENT_INTERRUPT,     /* milli second int enable      */
00162     CSL_RTC_SECEVENT_INTERRUPT,    /* second event int enable      */
00163     CSL_RTC_MINSEVENT_INTERRUPT,   /* minute event int enable      */
00164     CSL_RTC_HREVENT_INTERRUPT,     /* hour event int enable        */
00165     CSL_RTC_DAYEVENT_INTERRUPT,    /* day event int enable         */
00166     CSL_RTC_EXTEVENT_INTERRUPT,    /* external event int enable    */
00167     CSL_RTC_ALARM_INTERRUPT,       /* alarm int enable             */
00168     CSL_RTC_INTERRUPT_NONE         /*  No interrupt enable         */
00169 } CSL_RTCEventType;
00170 
00175 typedef enum
00176 {
00177     CSL_RTC_COMPENSATION_NEGATIVE = 0,   /* Negative drift in the msec value */
00178     CSL_RTC_COMPENSATION_POSITIVE,       /* Positive drift in the msec value */
00179     CSL_RTC_COMPENSATION_INVALID         /* Invalid value for error checking */
00180 } CSL_RTCCompType;

00279 /******************************************************************************
00280  * CSL RTC Inline function
00281  *****************************************************************************/
00311 static inline
00312 Uint16 rtcDivFun(
00313           Uint16 dividend,
00314           Uint16 divisor  )
00315 {
00316     Uint16 quoitient;
00317 
00318     quoitient = 0;
00319     while (dividend >= divisor)
00320     {
00321         quoitient++;
00322         dividend = dividend - divisor;
00323     }
00324     return quoitient;
00325 }
00326 
00353 static inline
00354 Uint16 rtcModuloDivFun(
00355           Uint16 dividend,
00356           Uint16 divisor  )
00357 {
00358     while (dividend >= divisor)
00359     {
00360         dividend = dividend - divisor;
00361     }
00362     return dividend;
00363 }
00397 static inline
00398 Uint16 rtc_pow(
00399            Uint16  var,
00400            Uint16  pow )
00401 {
00402     Uint16 result;
00403     Uint16 looper;
00404 
00405     result = 1;
00406     for (looper = 0 ; looper < pow; looper++)
00407     {
00408         result  = result * var;
00409     }
00410     return result;
00411 }
